* Represents a task to be done.
* @param description A line of String describing the Deadline object.
* Returns a string of the Todo object,
* @return A formatted string of Todo object.
* Returns a string of the Todo object,
* formatted for storing in a file.
* @return A formatted string of the Todo task for file storage.
Deadline dlTask = new Deadline("deadline return book", "2025-02-01 2359");
assertEquals("[D][ ] return book (by: Feb 01 2025 1159pm)", dlTask.toString(), "toString() format is incorrect");
assertEquals("[D][X] return book (by: Feb 01 2025 1159pm)", dlTask.toString(), "toString() format is incorrect after markDone");
assertEquals("[D][ ] return book (by: Feb 01 2025 1159pm)", dlTask.toString(), "toString() format is incorrect after unmarkDone");
Todo todoTask = new Todo("borrow book"); // ✅ Initialized in test method
assertEquals("[T][ ] exercise", todoTask.toString(), "toString() format is incorrect");
assertEquals("[T][X] exercise", todoTask.toString(), "toString() format is incorrect after markDone");
assertEquals("[T][ ] exercise", todoTask.toString(), "toString() format is incorrect after unmarkDone");
assertEquals("T | 0 | do homework", todoTask.toFileString(), "toFileString() format is incorrect");
assertEquals("T | 1 | do homework", todoTask.toFileString(), "toString() format is incorrect after markDone");
assertEquals("T | 0 | do homework", todoTask.toFileString(), "toString() format is incorrect after unmarkDone");
